answers.answer: Hi Nethmi,There are a number of things that can cause excessive hair loss.This may include stress. hormonal problems, certain medicines, infections or from an underlying disease, such as lupus or diabetes. It would be best to have this evaluated by your doctor for proper management. Treatment usually depends on the underlying cause. A complete medical history and physical examination is needed.Take care and regards.
